name: efcld

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wcel(cfv(ce, c0), cc), wcel(c0, cc))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(ce, c0), cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cfv(ce, c0), cc))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(ce, c0), cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cfv(ce, c0), cc))

|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(ce, c0), cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))

comment: Closure law for the exponential function, deduction version. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2021.)
